 In the event of a hijacking, yes it would be better if the other passengers were armed. It wouldnt necessarily stop the hijacker however. 
 
 But my point is that hijackings will be a whole lot MORE frequent if guns are allowed on planes. Hijackings in the United States are rare occurances, not common ones. If they happened on a weekly basis, then I would consider your position. But since we can go several years without any hijackings, under the current system, why take a chance and change that?
